title: Kevin Durant has thin skin, Lakers turmoil, Pelicans ineptitude and NBA trade deadline news
itunes:title: Kevin Durant has thin skin, Lakers turmoil, Pelicans ineptitude and NBA trade deadline news
description:
Colin discusses the latest tantrum from Golden State Warriors F Kevin Durant and why he will never be on the level of Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James, the current problems of the Los Angeles Lakers, why the New Orleans Pelicans are a horrible franchise, and the latest NBA trade deadline news. Guests include LaVar Ball, Chris Mannix, Chris Broussard, Richard Jefferson, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
